scripts.startNeos: cd TestDistribution && ddev start &&  ddev exec './softSiteDeleteAndSetup.sh'
scripts.resetNeos: cd TestDistribution && ddev exec './flow session:destroyall' && ddev exec './flow flow:cache:flush' && ddev exec './flow flow:cache:flush --force' && ddev exec './deleteAndSetupDb.sh' && curl https://carboncodepentestdistribution.ddev.site/
